sense.name: 昨天, yesterday, last,
sense.commentary: On the day before this day.
sense.examples:
昨天晚上 last night.
我昨天打电话给他。 I called him yesterday.
他昨天来了。 He came yesterday.

sense.name: 昨天， 过去，past
sense.commentary: The period before and until, but not including, the present time.
sense.examples:
今是昨非 realize how one has heen wrong in the past.
他从不谈他的过去。 He never talks about his past.
过去这里有很多店铺。 In the past, there were many stores here.
